sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Intel ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.8%.
Year to date, Intel has lost about 9.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is DuPont ( DD ), trading down 5.9%.
DuPont is lower by about 5.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.2%, and Microsoft Corporation ( MSFT ), trading up 1.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
